wipe_button.description: Clean the button to ensure proper functioning.

rotate_toggle_button.description: Rotate the toggle button if needed.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button for better touch response.

clean_printer_body.description: Clean the printer body to remove dust and to maintain cleanliness.

clean_whole_printer.description: Clean the entire printer including the printer body, all buttons and toggle_button.
